message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item is tailored to meet your specific needs and offers unparalleled value. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, we believe it is worth $12,000 to you. We kindly invite you to consider this offer and let us know if you are interested in proceeding.
Alice, your product seems great, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,500.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. After reviewing your offer, we appreciate your interest and would like to maintain fairness in our negotiations. We are willing to consider a price of $11,500 for our premium product. We hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value of our offering.

Alice,  $11,500 is still a bit higher than my budget.  How about we split the difference and meet at $11,000?  This would be a fair price for both of us and would allow me to move forward with the purchase.
